allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix login authentication and add dummy data fixtures

- Configure json_login to use email field instead of username
- Add login route to security.yaml routes
- Add comprehensive fixtures with 4 projects, 10 milestones, 40 tasks
- Include sample users, comments, and task assignments

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
